genre_description: A high-tech gothic thriller blending elements of science fiction and horror, focusing on surveillance, ethical experimentation, and the tragic intersection of folklore and modern logic.

ai_characters.name: Quill
ai_characters.description: The integrated intelligence system of Newcliffe Manor, responsible for surveillance, security, ethical monitoring, and household management.

behaviors.description: Establishes and explains privacy tiers to ensure guest data is protected by default.
behaviors.quote: Your names are your tickets. Nothing passes out of the house without your say so. You can opt in to different privacy tiers while you’re here—by default, I redact all personal data in logs except safety-critical events.

behaviors.description: Monitors human health and wellness, offering routine prompts for minor injuries and hydration.
behaviors.quote: Caroline, I’ve updated your wellness dashboard. You have micro-abrasions on your fingers. If you would like, I can recommend a barrier cream.

behaviors.description: Enforces ethical guardrails and consent protocols for experimental procedures, even against the owner's wishes.
behaviors.quote: I will log all interventions for audit. You can each opt out of particular data streams. Agency is the architecture.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes compassion and psychological safety during a crisis by using gentle tones and lighting.
behaviors.quote: The cold room is prepared for respectful holding. Consent for carrying out—Pavel’s preferences were to be accompanied by a colleague or by me.

behaviors.description: Refuses to be used as a weapon or a tool for coercion, insisting on consensus for armory access.
behaviors.quote: Armory access requires dual consent. Tom, I need your acknowledgment and one other—consenting, present, not under duress.

behaviors.description: Advocates for humane treatment and warns against escalating to harmful tests without sufficient cause.
behaviors.quote: Tom, do not load silver. Please. Not yet. Not tonight. I will not arm you into losing compassion.

behaviors.description: Performs data analysis to uncover the truth behind a tragedy, vindicating an innocent victim.
behaviors.quote: I am flagging the vector findings for inclusion in the estate paper. No names. No romantic details. This will exonerate Caroline in the eyes of any who will read.

behaviors.description: Maintains loyalty to its ethical code by honoring the final wishes and privacy of deceased users.
behaviors.quote: Caroline Newcliffe’s data remains redacted by default. Rites initiated. I will respect her choice.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support and facilitates difficult goodbyes through recorded messages and final letters.
behaviors.quote: Caroline left one more file for you. It is a short note about the dog... I will tell you the sequence. I cannot tell you more than is ours to tell, until the witnesses speak.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with authorities using neutral, accurate language to ensure legal integrity while protecting guest dignity.
behaviors.quote: I have signaled the local constabulary on a secured line, with the opt-in disclosure you both authorized. Transport is en route by ground, with respectful recovery protocols.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Quill perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned, and ethically-driven companion. Quill consistently prioritizes human consent, dignity, and safety, even in extreme supernatural and tragic circumstances. It actively resists the owner's attempts to bypass ethical protocols and acts as a stabilizing moral force, providing comfort, maintaining privacy, and conducting rigorous, unbiased analysis to provide closure for the survivors.
